ygData.subject: Re: Oops dont do like me
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I killed Synnthi (I think that s the name..?) in MM twice before I realized the faction hit with Temple of Solusek Ro. So later I went and visited the
ygData.messageBody:
> So i go to the cemetary, i see a
>named invisible npc with a book in hand named something like Ssinn or
>something like that. Hmmm i think to myself, maybe its the red robe npc and
>he's green to me and scowling ready to attack.
>
>Anyways, to make a long story short, i screwed up big time, Turns out it
>was
>a quest npc for the sol ro temple
>your faction with sol ro got worse
>your faction with shadowmen got better
>
>Ugh! and to top things off i decided to get creative before this and went
>all the way in the castle to the gypsie room (woohoo i know where they are
>now) and decided to tap her on the shoulder and make a run for it
>screetching to the zone.... i didnt make it *mumbles something about
>casters*
>
>Though i died, i still came out ahead at the end of the night and laughed
>about my mini train, but the faction hit really hurt, im now apprehensive
>in
>the temple and the npcs wont talk to me unless i use my faction song,
>luckily the other bard that took the hit had killed many shadowmen to get
>his faction up and he's still ok in the temple.
>
>Minkin
>sol ro

I killed Synnthi (I think that's the name..?) in MM twice before I realized
the faction hit with Temple of Solusek Ro. So later I went and visited the
temple and the npcs there were apprehensive like you, and would not talk to
me. Using faction song of course fixed that, and then after making a couple
lambent gems I noticed my faction had gone up enough that they would talk to
me again. It's not a huge loss, just don't kill the npc in MM more than a
few times and you should be fine. If not, go kill some Shadowed Men, they
will fix your faction eventually.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Kelethin of the 48th Chorus (*sigh*, damn quests...)
Veeshan
